LanguageData.Make_darkenergy.label: Contained Dark Energy
LanguageData.Make_darkenergy.description: A container holding the pure essence of dark energy, a mixture of science and magic. Used to make dark matter.
LanguageData.Make_darkmatter.label: Contained Dark Matter
LanguageData.Make_darkmatter.description: A container holding pure dark matter, the material of the most destructive qualities. Used for making the godly weapons at a forge.
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel.label: Dark Steel
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel.description: A metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_Black.label: Black Dark Steel
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_Black.description: A metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_Darkened.label: Darkened Dark Steel
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_Darkened.description: A metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_Gold.label: Golden Dark Steel
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_Gold.description: A metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_Marble.label: Marbled Dark Steel
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_Marble.description: A metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_White.label: White Dark Steel
LanguageData.Make_DarkSteel_White.description: A metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
